name: Asteroids (itch) (ASN22 Dev)
description:
How to play

Try to shoot and destroy as many asteroids as possible without dying!

Controls

W/S - Move

A/D - Turn

Space - Shoot

Soundtrack

The soundtrack for the game (loop-able!) is downloadable for free, and you can use it however you like, but credit is very much appreciated!

Disclaimer

This game is a remake of the classic arcade game: Asteroids!
